formatDescription: vCard is a file format standard for electronic business cards, although much less frequently used at the time of writing. vCards are often attached to e-mail messages, but can be exchanged in other ways, such as on the internet or instant messaging.
provenanceCompoundName: National Archives of Australia / National Archives of Australia

internalSignatures.name: vCard v.2.1
internalSignatures.note:
Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: (BEGIN:VCARD|begin:vcard).*(VERSION|version):2.1
EOF, offset 0-4: (END:VCARD|end:vcard)
